title: RequestChunkRadiusPacket
description: The client can't just change the view radius without the server's approval, otherwise there could be holes on unrendered area.

$metaProperties.[cereal:packet_details]: This packet is to make sure that the server expands/shrinks first. Additionally for ClientSide Chunk Generation we can send a byte, based on client's hardware capabilities what is the max chunk radius client can handle.
